channel.title: Making Someone Admin, Mod please remote assistance help!Just Read its easy to do
channel.description:
Ok i know there is a thread stickied above my head but it aint working for me im taking you through what i do ok, Thanks.
[b]Step 1[/b] go to charater file and turn player rights to 2 [b]Step 2[/b] Go to file save and then shut off screen [b]Step 3[/b] compile and press enter when compiled then shut screen down [b]Step 4[/b] They log in and they aint a admin :confused:
i need remote assistance help just add footydefender@hotmail.co.uk ill show you how

item.title: Making Someone Admin, Mod please remote assistance help!Just Read its easy to do

item.description:
@rw_master wrote:

ok Thanks guys im back now ill try if not someone use remote assistance or something lol[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 12:57:20 PM[/size][hr]aww its not working could some add me on msn and do remote assistance so they can do it for me plz?

item.title: Making Someone Admin, Mod please remote assistance help!Just Read its easy to do
item.dc:creator: @ownage-2007 ownage-2007
item.description:
@ownage-2007 wrote:

1: go to the character and change rights to 2/1 (make sure they are logged out during steps 1 & 2)
2: save
3: get them to log back in and walah mod.

Read full topic
item.source: Making Someone Admin, Mod please remote assistance help!Just Read its easy to do

item.title: Making Someone Admin, Mod please remote assistance help!Just Read its easy to do
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

Yes, many people have problems with this, it’s quite common. Simply, when you change the rights, keep the characters.txt file up of whoever’s rights you changed. Then do the process, compile, run, log on and see if it has changed.

Read full topic
